{{Doomwiki}} '''ManDoom''', short for ''Manly-Ass Doom'', was a [[source port]] made by [[Tain]]. It is a slightly modified build of [[ZDoom]] (version 2.5.0 in 1.17 and 2.7.1 in 2.00) disallowing the save and load functionality in the engine, establishing {{wp|Permadeath}}. ManDoom also provides support for randomly generated maps each session, courtesy of the [[OBLIGE]] level generator.
Because of its feature set, ManDoom has seen limited use in [[TAS]] [[speedrunning]] demos.
